item.description:
Who's hosting? Angelo

How to find us: Look for the MeetUp Sign on the table

cancel

Feeling HOT HOT HOT!!!

Last years summer dance party had over 250 people having a geat time, and meeting new friends.  So come on down and join us on Saturday June 25th, doors open at 8PM

They'll be people coming from all over and who knows you could meet someone special.

Lots of great people, and new faces having a great time. Large dance floor / Hot & Cold Hor D'ouevres / Great Music Plenty of free parking / $7 cover till 8:30 then $10 after so get there early! Doors open at 8PM Proper dress required.

Here is an idea!  Let people you would like to meet in a casual atmosphere, know that you will be there.  It doesn't have to be a "date" just a chance to meet.  If you hit it off great, and if not you didn't waste an entire evening. 

There is also a chance to win a free entry into the dance by letting them know you are coming at www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables with the Meetup Signs
item.name: Hot Fun in the summertime, dance party!!!
